HANDS.Notes: Damage (str+3)M Stun when ejected, replacement cost 3

HANDS.Name: Hand, Ripper
HANDS.Notes: Normal hand with Ripper mounted in upper hand and wrist

HANDS.Name: Hand, Spike
HANDS.Notes: Damage (str-1)M, -1 to target number in climbing tests.

HANDS.Name: Hand, Tool
HANDS.Notes: Screwdriver,Wrench,Battery power soldering iron,socket wrench, handy hammer.

HANDS.Name: +Hands, Web (DYNALAR)
HANDS.Notes: Need Cyberarm or Cyberhand +1 die in athletics

HANDS.Name: +Quick Change Mount Hand
HANDS.Notes: Allow to change hand without tools
